actions.text: On agreeing to the Spratt amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment establishes a five-year pilot project that permits the Department of Defense, with OPM, to adopt more flexible personnel management regulations for its defense acquisition workforce.
purpose: An amendment not preprinted in the Congressional Record to establish a five-year pilot project that permits the Department of Defense, with OPM, to adopt more flexible personal management regulations for its defense acquisition workforce.
